thread.section_title: Livewire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Livewire | www.getlivewire.com
thread.title: Shane West

author: Shane West
title: Shane West
text: I have been working with LiveWire since the construction of my home in Spring 2016. Since then, I have had the opportunity to work with several individuals and create a superb system for my home theater room. Installation was this week of all of my equipment and everything is above what I expected. Not only did the crew do a fabulous job on installation, but were very well versed to answer any questions I had. I would recommend this company to anyone!
